lead_paragraph: One test was canceled, and the Education Ministry, along with the police and military officers who guard the exams, faced a wave of criticism.

headline.print_headline: Criticism of Egypt’s Education System Intensifies After Leaks of Answers to National Exams
headline.main: Leaks of Answers Before Egypt’s National Exams Embarrass Government

snippet: One test was canceled, and the Education Ministry, along with the police and military officers who guard the exams, faced a wave of criticism.
abstract: Egypt's Education Ministry faces public criticism after two annual high school exams called Thanaweya Amma, which determine entry to state-run universities and institutes, were leaked and posted on Facebook by person or group under moniker Chao Ming; high school student Mohanad Ahmed and 25 other people have been arrested in connection to leaked documents.
